*div1 type="summary"* *p*James F. Perry to Austin, Potosí, July 18, 1830. Preparations for removal to Texas. Slaves. Austin's reserve.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Potosi Mo*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-18-1830">July the 18th 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sr*/p*
*p*I got *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*on the *date_mentioned n="06-12-1830">12th June*/date_mentioned* found all well with the addition of a fine *person_mentioned*Son*/person_mentioned*, I would have wrote to you sooner but from the unsettled state of my business I heardly knew what to say. I find it will be a tedious task to settle it all up and take more time than I expected, from the most moderate calculation*person_mentioned* S. Perry*/person_mentioned* and myself made we calculated we had on hands lead to pay all the debts of the firm and have some left. *person_mentioned*S. Perry*/person_mentioned* has returned he only sold part and from the present prices I am afraid there will not be enough to pay off the debts of the firm, which will derange my calculations verry much I will of necessity have to remain here untill they are all paid. We have a considerable sum in the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*but times are so dull and money so scarce it is verry dificult to make collections I am anxious to move *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1830">this fall*/date_mentioned* but I find it will be imposible *person_mentioned*Emily*/person_mentioned* is not willing to move in the *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1831">spring */date_mentioned*for fear of sickness for my part I think there would be no danger if we could get there in *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1830">March*/date_mentioned* or *date_mentioned n="04-xx-1830">April*/date_mentioned*, but I expect we will be governed by your advice. I sold our *location_mentioned*house and lots we live on*/location_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Hutchings */location_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*Bell*/person_mentioned*s notes and expect to sell another *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*in a few days to *person_mentioned*John Perry*/person_mentioned* for goods to be recd in *location_mentioned*Phila */location_mentioned*If I do so I will be in *location_mentioned*Phila */location_mentioned*the last of *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1830">Sept*/date_mentioned*. if I can get off if not I will send *person_mentioned*Mr Hunter*/person_mentioned* with that we will have about 2000$ to lay out in goods in addition to our present stock which is not less than 3000$ we will try and get them in in the month of *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1830">November*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*While on the *location_mentioned*bay */location_mentioned*you promissed to give me a copy of an endenture to take on our *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*, Which was forgot in the hurry at *location_mentioned*S Felipe */location_mentioned*please send me one. from all the laws I see on the subject I am apprehensive an endenture on those under age would not be good we have Eight and only 3 or 4 of them is of age give me your advise on that matter to loose them after I get them there would be a serious loss to me. There has been a considerable stir here about *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*but the unsettled state of the Govrnt is a great obsticle. A good many talks of going but I doubt whether many will move or not *person_mentioned*S. T Dunklin*/person_mentioned* says he will go to see it this *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1830">fall */date_mentioned*I told him you had reservd a tract for him *location_mentioned*near the bay*/location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*John Jones*/person_mentioned* talks of starting in *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1830">September */date_mentioned*by land When I read your letter which was recd in my absence stating the particulars of the *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*you obtaine'd for us I was mortifyed not because the *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*ware different from what I understood but at your silance on that subject to me. What the object of your silance was I am at a loss to conceive. When with you on the *location_mentioned*bay */location_mentioned*I thought you was verry reserved towards me but did not expect you would have been reserved in anything that related to the sole object of my journey to that *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. Why not tell me the nature of the *location_mentioned*grants */location_mentioned*and how you intended to locate them. This I certainly think you ought to have don. from my understanding of your letter the intention of the *location_mentioned*Grant */location_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*is for her *person_mentioned*eldest children */person_mentioned*which was perfectly right in you to do so when you had it in your power. And it would have been much more satisfactory to me if you had desclosed your views to me there. With regard to these *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*I have no reflections to make on myself I have always don for them and by them as well as I would have or could have don if they had been my own. Through the hole course of my life I have ever acted candidly towards both *person_mentioned*relatives */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and hope ever so to do and would wish them to act so towards me. this I believe is the best course to gain and retain the confidance of each other.*/p*
*p*The suit in *location_mentioned*N Jersey*/location_mentioned* is expected to be determined in *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1830">October*/date_mentioned* next *person_mentioned*S. Perry*/person_mentioned* is in a verry delicate health I think it doubtful whether he is long for this *location_mentioned*world*/location_mentioned*. A great many of our *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned* here think we are going a wild goos chase when we start for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. Is *person_mentioned*James Austin*/person_mentioned* alive yet I am afraid not. I have not seen *person_mentioned*Hammond */person_mentioned*I dont know whether he is going to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*or not. *person_mentioned*Woodson*/person_mentioned* was here last week to talk of moving *person_mentioned*Henry Bates */person_mentioned*I hear has give out the notice I have nothing more to ad. alls well, adue—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Potosi Mo*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-19-1830">July 19 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed] : *person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Filipe de Austin Texas */location_mentioned*To the Care of *person_mentioned*Hugh McGuffen Esq*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*post Master *location_mentioned*Sabine Post office Louissianna*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
